sites.description: Audeze full website template with mega navigation and product showcase
sites.prompt: Generate a high-fidelity full-site template for Audeze. Preserve multi-level dropdown navigation with image+text style content cues. Include one representative product detail page for product display only (no cart/checkout/e-commerce flow). Include a technology/blog page using markdown-friendly article structure. Include a support page with content only; do not implement download actions. Exclude failed extraction pages from template output and record them in extraction_failures report.
